Name: Day: 40
About the game: Experience thrilling survival horror combined with first person combat in an open world full of exploration. The journey began with the deluge of rain which flooded the earth for 39 days. On day 40, it stops. Mysteries can be discovered and solved in a land full of unique scenarios. Take yourself into a world of dark, atmospheric locales where wildlife and other strange beings are present. Learn what has begun, and make it cease. Features: - First person action with survival elements - State of the art graphics with physically based rendering, volumetric lighting and high quality models. - Gruesome, horrifying creatures that defy imagination - Puzzles and secrets that bend the mind - Massive open world where enemies and wildlife roam dynamically. No two playthroughs are the same. - Full controller support (Xbox 360/One gamepad or compatible)
Meta Title: Day: 40: May 27, 2019, Andrew Grbac and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Day: 40? Check out the release date (May 27, 2019), developer insights from Andrew Grbac, and a complete game summary.
